triples.subject: Gameplay Ability
triples.context: Gameplay Ability是UGameplayAbility类的子类，理解继承关系有助于掌握其基本特性和功能

triples.subject: Gameplay Ability
triples.context: Gameplay Ability定义了技能的效果，这是其核心功能之一

triples.subject: Gameplay Ability
triples.context: Gameplay Ability可以定义使用技能需要付出的代价，如资源消耗

triples.subject: Gameplay Ability
triples.context: Gameplay Ability定义了何时或在何情况下可以使用技能

triples.subject: Gameplay Ability
triples.context: Gameplay Ability可以在整个网络中自我复制，支持多人游戏

triples.subject: Gameplay Ability
triples.context: Gameplay Ability支持客户端预测，提高响应速度

triples.subject: Gameplay Ability
triples.context: Gameplay Ability支持RPC，实现跨网络通信

triples.subject: Gameplay Ability
triples.context: Gameplay Ability需要通过技能系统组件授予和撤销

triples.subject: 技能系统组件
triples.context: 技能系统组件提供GiveAbility函数来授予技能

triples.subject: 技能系统组件
triples.context: 技能系统组件提供ClearAbility函数来撤销技能

triples.subject: Gameplay Ability
triples.context: Gameplay Ability有一系列生命周期函数如CanActivateAbility、CallActivateAbility等

triples.subject: Gameplay Ability
triples.context: Gameplay Ability使用标记系统来确定技能间的交互方式

triples.subject: Gameplay Ability
triples.context: Gameplay Ability支持不同的复制策略以适应不同网络需求

triples.subject: Gameplay Ability
triples.context: Gameplay Ability支持不同的实例化策略以平衡性能和功能

triples.subject: Gameplay Ability
triples.context: Gameplay Ability可以响应玩法事件来触发技能

triples.subject: Gameplay Ability
triples.context: Gameplay Ability提供取消技能的机制

triples.subject: Gameplay Ability
triples.context: Gameplay Ability需要正确结束以避免系统状态异常

triples.subject: Gameplay Ability
triples.context: Gameplay Ability使用CommitAbility来应用技能消耗

triples.subject: Gameplay Ability
triples.context: Gameplay Ability可以启动异步任务来完成复杂操作

triples.subject: Gameplay Ability
triples.context: Gameplay Ability可以与动画蒙太奇集成
